authors.author: Fanny J. Crosby William J. Kirkpatrick

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: He hideth my soul newline In the cleft of the rock newline That shadows a dry, thirsty land. newline He hideth my life newline In the depths of His love. newline And covers me there with His hand. newline And covers me there with His hand.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: A wonderful Savior is Jesus my Lord, newline A wonderful Savior to me. newline He hideth my soul newline In the cleft of the rock, newline Where rivers of pleasure I see.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: A wonderful Savior is Jesus my Lord. newline He taketh my burden away. newline He holdeth me up newline And I shall not be moved. newline He giveth me strength as my day.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: With numberless blessings newline Each moment He crowns; newline And filled with His fullness divine, newline I sing in my rapture, "Oh, glory to God newline For such a Redeemer as mine!"

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: When clothed in His brightness newline Transported I rise, newline To meet Him in clouds of the sky, newline His perfect salvation, newline His wonderful love I'll shout newline With the millions on high.
